Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
July 2022 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

We are starting the second half of 2022 and are thrilled about all the team’s hard work, achievements, and milestones. Do not hesitate to help us identify ways to improve how we work and deliver the best service and ROI for our clients. On another note, in light of the recent COVID-19 wave and the rise in cases, we highly encourage you to stay safe and healthy! Any comments or questions? Support our commitment to improving employee communication.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Justia Connect Pro: A big one! Our team released the latest main Justia product: Justia Connect Pro, our paid membership program. It was a company-wide massive effort that involved updates of multiple properties, products and marketing campaigns.

Justia Amplify Google APIs: We completed the migration of the projects that use Google Ads and Google Business Profiles APIs to the latest versions to guarantee uninterrupted services for our Justia Amplify clients.

Data Reports: Our Data Team analyzed the Justia Lawyer Directory Peer and Client Reviews for the month. After further discussion with our Product Team, we came up with an action plan to improve the numbers to help us reach our yearly goal.

IT Maintenance: As part of our ongoing efforts, there were multiple IT maintenance actions during this month, including the migration of the Dockets infrastructure and our internal projects servers, to name a few.

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

  • Additional Snippets. We have improved the accessibility and clarity of the Bankruptcy Legal Guide by writing more snippets to highlight key points in this area.
  • Final Case Law Outlines. We have concluded writing case outlines for law school elective courses, such as Real Estate Transactions, Securities Law, and Local Government Law. Look for those to be posted in the Justia Law Schools Center in June!
  • Review of Supreme Court Site. We have started identifying areas for improvement in our U.S. Supreme Court site's case overview pages and home page. The design team will be putting together some great new visuals shortly.
  • Justia Onward Blog Posts Highlighting Justia Legal Guides. We wrote a couple of posts on our Justia Onward blog explaining how consumers could use our Intellectual Property Center and our Products Liability Center.
  • Justia Mexico Portal. Our team continues expanding the resources available on the Justia Mexico Portal. We recently added new pages to the Intellectual Property Center regarding trademark licensing, copyright assignments, book publication, music publication agreements, and software copyright matters.

NEW TEAM MEMBERS

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Alejandro Mejia

IT Team

Hello team! My name is Alejandro Mejia. I am from San Luis Potosí. I am 22 years old and a self-taught person passionate about the IT world. I like to exercise at the gym and play musical instruments in my free time. I am willing to turn my dreams into goals and will not stop until I see them come true. I love learning new things daily and sharing my knowledge with others.

DID YOU KNOW?

Justia Attended Student Events

On May 19th, Justia participated in an event organized by the Computer Systems Engineering Student Chapter at the Technical Institute of Saltillo with the presentation “The Importance of Legal Aspects for a Tech Startup” presented by Claudia Duque. We had a very dynamic event where the attendees got involved with comments and questions related to the topic.

On May 24th and 25th, Justia participated in the DevWeek 2022 student group Bee Developers event. Angel Ponce participated with the conference: “A Short Story of Web Performance from Page Speed to Core Vitals,” and Claudia Duque presented “The Importance of Legal Aspects for a Tech Startup.”

UPCOMING HOLIDAYS

Dates to Remember

USA Independence Day - July 4th

On July 4th, also known as Independence Day, the United States observes a federal holiday in honor of the Declaration of Independence. Specifically, the holiday commemorates America’s revolutionary Charter of Freedom. Happy Fourth of July!

TEAM ACTIVITY

Visitors at the MX Office

We were happy to have had visitors from the Engineering, IT, Help Desk, Marketing, and Frontend Teams at the Mexico office. We were thrilled to reunite and spend time with the different team members. We had a chance to meet the new people joining the Justia family in person, and they had the opportunity to visit the office for the first time.

Virtual Just Meet Up!

On May 26th, we had another session of the Just Meet Up! Hector Lugo shared professional advice regarding one of the most critical aspects of career development; the resume. We had participants from all over the country.

REVIEWs & RECOMMENDATIONs

The Wild

Available on Prime Video

A group of teenage girls unites as they learn of the secrets and traumas they have endured throughout their lives. Leadership arises in each member. But there is something unexpected in this exciting drama: the girls didn't end up on the island by accident.

- Claudia Duque

Collaborators: Alejandra Medina, Alejandro Moreno, Arturo Jara, Erika Azuela, Haydee Garcia, Jose Ramos, Lauren Moskie, Miguel Berlanga, Rene Peralta, and Zoraida Vallejo.
